review_title: Overall, a good place to work
pros: Nice work environment, pleasant settings, pleasant HR department, nice coworkers, plenty of opportunities for advancement, decent pay once you are promoted to a management position.  Best feature is organization was started by parents to ensure their adult children with developmental disabilities always had a home.  Client centered environment.
cons: Unfortunately, there is a level of favoritism among senior level staff, some of whom display poor work ethics yet whom are rewarded by promotions.  Staff morale tends to be low.  Pay is low, too many management level staff.
